name: Light Guardian
description:
Created by Malik Nouman Ali and Mian Harris Sameer.

In this fast-paced 2D top-down game, players must defend the center lights at all costs. As waves of night bandits approach from all directions, players must strategically and carefully choose which enemies to kill first in order to withstand the assault.

With a wide variety of enemies and power-ups at their disposal, players must outsmart and outmaneuver their foes in order to emerge victorious. Do you have what it takes to defend the last light and emerge as the sole protector? Play now to find out!

This game offers endless replayability and fun with increasingly difficult challenges. Can you rise to the top of the leaderboard and claim your place as the ultimate defender of the light?
